text: Psychology Today is an American media organization that provides information about psychology and how people behave. It started as a magazine that came out every two months in 1967. Psychology Today is now a website that also offers lists of therapists and health experts, along with hundreds of blog posts. These posts are written by different professions, including psychologists, psychiatrists, social workers, doctors, therapists who specialize in marriage and family, anthropologists, sociologists, and journalists who write about science. ==References== Category:Organizations based in New York (state) Category:1967 establishments in the United States Category:Psychology
title: Psychology Today
